title: Citron
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, French
description: Billed as a higher-end fast casual restaurant, this is a Parisian style salad bar, located 1-minute walk from Gaienmae station in Minami Aoyama at 東京都港区南青山2-27-21. Vegan options marked on the menu. Set menus including salad with soup, bread or salad with soup and main. Desserts and wine available. English menu and English/French speaking staff. Opened July 2015.
